metadata.title: CVE-2019-15733 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in GitLab Community and Enterprise Edition 7.12through 12.2.1. The specified default branch name could be exposed tounauthorized users.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
